docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message.
docs.title: Commands

docs.text: mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Project layout

docs.text: Pour un conteneur MKDOCS - docker run -v $HOME:/root/mkdocs-test python:2.7 - pip install mkdocs-material - cd /root/mkdocs-test - mkdocs build Pour un conteneur HTTPD - docker run -dit -v $PWD/site:/usr/local/apache2/htdocs -p 8080:80 httpd Suite git clone lerepo cd lerepo docker run --rm -it -v ${PWD}:/docs squidfunk/mkdocs-material build 2080 docker run -dit -p 8080:80 -v "$PWD/site":/usr/local/apache2/htdocs/ httpd
docs.title: Installation

docs.text: - docker run -v $HOME:/root/mkdocs-test python:2.7 - pip install mkdocs-material - cd /root/mkdocs-test - mkdocs build
docs.title: Pour un conteneur MKDOCS

docs.text: git clone lerepo cd lerepo docker run --rm -it -v ${PWD}:/docs squidfunk/mkdocs-material build 2080 docker run -dit -p 8080:80 -v "$PWD/site":/usr/local/apache2/htdocs/ httpd
docs.title: Suite
